/usr/bin/c++  -O3 -g  -std=c++11 -pthread -Wno-multichar  -march=native              -Wall                                       -Wextra                                     -Wpedantic                                  -Wcast-qual                              -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/robot.dir/talk.cpp.o -o ../../bin/robot  -Wl,-rpath,/home/shier/curriculum_design/speech_singal_processing/design/speech_recognize/build ../libcommon.a ../libcommon-sdl.a ../../libwhisper.so libInferLLM.a -ldl /usr/lib/libSDL2main.a /usr/lib/libSDL2-2.0.so.0.2600.5
